programme.title: Meri Bahuain
programme.desc: A family drama that explores love, jealousy, and power struggles among daughters-in-law fighting for respect, affection, and control in one household.

programme.title: Jin Ki Shadi Unki Shadi
programme.desc: A lighthearted family drama where love, humour, and misunderstandings intertwine, revealing how one marriage decision changes many lives.

programme.title: Sultan Salahuddin Ayyubi
programme.desc: This drama series focuses on the life of 12th-century Muslim ruler Salahuddin Ayyubi, how he conquered Jerusalem, his struggles and battles against the Crusaders and his goal to unite Muslims.

programme.title: Oh Rungreza
programme.desc: Born in a poet's house, Sassi lives in her own fantasies but in pursuit of her ideal man Punhal; she has to face some real obstacles to do this.
